column.name: allowSelection
column.remarks: Can this be selected by users in drop-downs?

column.name: add_max_travel_hours
column.remarks: Maximum travel hours to this site from CNC

column.name: htmlBody
column.remarks: Optional (if exists then used instead of textBody)

column.name: sendEmail
column.remarks: Always, Never, Skip work commenced email

column.name: importedFlag
column.remarks: Was this row imported successfully? Y/N

column.name: monitorName
column.remarks: name of the monitor, to allow tracking of the failure and success

column.name: monitorAgentName
column.remarks: This is the computer that the monitor has failed against.

column.name: importErrorFound
column.remarks: Has the import process already found this error

column.name: importDateTime
column.remarks: Date this row was updated into the CNC datbase

column.name: createDateTime
column.remarks: Date this row was created in this table

column.name: caa_siteno
column.remarks: Site for activity. FK to address.add_siteno

column.name: caa_completed_consno
column.remarks: User that completed activity. . FK to consultant.cns_consno

column.name: caa_awaiting_customer_response_flag
column.remarks: If so then exclude this from time duration calculations

column.name: caa_logging_error_flag
column.remarks: Was there an error when logging this activity

column.name: caa_secondsite_error_server
column.remarks: When 2ndSite error activity, this is the server name

column.name: caa_awaiting_customer_response_flag
column.remarks: If so then exclude this from time duration calculations

column.name: caa_logging_error_flag
column.remarks: Was there an error when logging this activity

column.name: cat_ooh_multiplier
column.remarks: Cost Multiplier to apply when activity is Out of Office Hours

column.name: cat_allow_exp_flag
column.remarks: Users may log expense claims against this

column.name: curValueFlag
column.remarks: Currency value only (used for prepay topup)

column.name: activeFlag
column.remarks: Is this activity type in use?

column.name: showNotChargeableFlag
column.remarks: On customer activity emails, show if not chargeable

column.name: cat_portal_display_flag
column.remarks: SHould activity be displayed on portal

column.name: appearInQueueFlag
column.remarks: Does this user appear in the dashboard queues?

column.name: standardDayHours
column.remarks: Number of hours in user's standard day

column.name: changeApproverFlag
column.remarks: Allowed to approve changes in Change Control process

column.name: con_mailflag1
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag2
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag3
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag4
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag5
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag6
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag7
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag8
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag9
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: con_mailflag10
column.remarks: Refer to header table for meaning

column.name: cui_sales_order_status
column.remarks: Which type of sales order to create when billing

column.name: totalInvoiceMonths
column.remarks: Number of months to add to install date to calculate next invoice due date

column.name: dateGenerated
column.remarks: Contract date of last Sales Order/Invoice

column.name: qty
column.remarks: Quotation renewal unit qty (e.g. Antivirus users)

column.name: cui_consno
column.remarks: User who originaly despatched sales order

column.name: secondsiteValidationSuspendUntilDate
column.remarks: Suspend 2nd site validation until this date

column.name: secondsiteImageDelayDays
column.remarks: Delay image date check by this many days

column.name: secondsiteImageDelayUserID
column.remarks: User that last set image delay

column.name: secondsiteImageDelayDate
column.remarks: Date that image delay was last set on

column.name: autoGenerateContractInvoice
column.remarks: Indicates if Contract Renewal automatically generates an invoice or just a sales order

column.name: cus_work_started_email_main_flag
column.remarks: Should work stared emails be sent from service system?

column.name: reviewAction
column.remarks: What to do on next review

column.name: cus_tech_notes
column.remarks: Notes to appear on all request screens

column.name: cus_send_contract_email
column.remarks: If set then send an email of conttracts to email address

column.name: cus_send_tandc_email
column.remarks: If set then send T&C email to portal user

column.name: cus_review_meeting_email_sent_flag
column.remarks: Has a meeting reminder been sent?

column.name: exp_exported_flag
column.remarks: indicates whether this expense has been exported to the file

column.name: licenceRenewalDate
column.remarks: Date item is due for renewal

column.name: hed_high_activity_alert_count
column.remarks: Number of activities per day per request triggers an alert email

column.name: hed_sr_import_attachment_directory
column.remarks: Network path to SR import email attachments

column.name: hed_allowed_client_ip_pattern
column.remarks: regx pattern for allowed client IP

column.name: hed_hd_team_limit_hours
column.remarks: Default time limit for solving problems by helpdesk team

column.name: hed_es_team_limit_hours
column.remarks: Default time limit for escalations team to solve SR

column.name: hed_im_team_limit_hours
column.remarks: Default time linit for implementations team to solve SR

column.name: hed_hd_team_max_pause_count
column.remarks: Maximum no of times activity may be paused by member of SD team

column.name: hed_hd_team_pause_seconds
column.remarks: Length of activity pause in seconds

column.name: hed_hd_team_target_log_percentage
column.remarks: Help Desk team target percentage of time to be logged per day

column.name: hed_es_team_target_log_percentage
column.remarks: Escalations team target percentage of time to be logged per day

column.name: hed_im_team_target_log_percentage
column.remarks: Implementation team target % of time to be logged per day

column.name: hed_hd_team_target_sla_percentage
column.remarks: HD team target response within SLA percentage

column.name: hed_es_team_target_sla_percentage
column.remarks: ES team target response within SLA percentage

column.name: hed_sr_autocomplete_threshold_hours
column.remarks: Hours under which SRs get automatically completed

column.name: hed_sr_prompt_contract_threshold_hours
column.remarks: Hours under which to prompt for a contract when fixing SRs above P3

column.name: hed_remote_support_warn_hours
column.remarks: Hours over which on remote support activity to warn user

column.name: hed_customer_contact_warn_hours
column.remarks: Hours over which on remote customer contact activity to warn user

column.name: odl_ordlineno
column.remarks: PK so that phpMyAdmin can edit rows

column.name: pro_date_raised
column.remarks: Date the problem was first raised in the system

column.name: pro_fixed_consno
column.remarks: User that fixed problem. FK to consultant.cns_consno

column.name: pro_working_hours
column.remarks: Number of working hours since problem first raised

column.name: pro_sent_sla_alert_flag
column.remarks: Set to show SLA alert email has been sent

column.name: pro_completion_alert_count
column.remarks: How many completion alerts have been sent to the customer

column.name: pro_complete_date
column.remarks: Date when request to be completed either manually or automatically

column.name: pro_email_option
column.remarks: A=Always, N=Never or S=Skip work commenced email

column.name: pro_hide_from_customer_flag
column.remarks: Hide all SR activity from customer

column.name: pro_sla_response_hours
column.remarks: Elapsed hours from raised to responded

column.name: pro_escalated_consno
column.remarks: User that escalated. FK to consultant.cns_consno

column.name: pro_contno
column.remarks: Customer Contact that raised Request. FK to contact.con_contno

column.name: pro_technician_weighting
column.remarks: Priority for engineer dashboard. Not used in any other context.

column.name: pro_rejected_consno
column.remarks: User that last rejected request. FK to consultant.cns_consno

column.name: pro_do_next_flag
column.remarks: Indicates the engineer should work on this request next

column.name: pro_rootcauseno
column.remarks: Root Cause of problem. FK to rootcause.rtc_rootcauseno

column.name: pro_working_hours_alert_sent_flag
column.remarks: Has an alert been sent when number of elapsed hours exceeds system limit?

column.name: pro_awaiting_customer_response_flag
column.remarks: Are we waiting for customer action?

column.name: pro_working_hours_calculated_to_time
column.remarks: This is an optomisisation used by BUProblemSLA

column.name: pro_manager_comment
column.remarks: Manager's comments (only visible to helpdesk manager)

column.name: pro_hd_time_alert_flag
column.remarks: HD team time alert has been displayed

column.name: pro_es_time_alert_flag
column.remarks: ES team time alert has been displayed

column.name: pro_im_time_alert_flag
column.remarks: IM team time alert flag has been displayed

column.name: pro_hd_pause_count
column.remarks: Number of times HD pause button has been clicked

column.name: pro_started_consno
column.remarks: User that started work on SR

column.name: que_weight
column.remarks: Weighting to control display order on screen

column.name: qur_name_required
column.remarks: Is a name required when completing questionnaire?

column.name: totalInvoiceMonths
column.remarks: Number of months to add to install date to calculate next invoice due date

column.name: dateGenerated
column.remarks: This is the date that the quotation was generated from the renewal record

column.name: hdTeamTargetSlaPercentage
column.remarks: HD team target response within SLA percentage

column.name: hdTeamActualSlaPercentage
column.remarks: HD team actual response within SLA percentage

column.name: esTeamTargetSlaPercentage
column.remarks: ES team target response within SLA percentage

column.name: esTeamActualSlaPercentage
column.remarks: ES team actual response within SLA percentage

column.name: breachCount
column.remarks: Number of breaches of this SR on this Date

column.name: startedTime
column.remarks: time started work - use for daily running performance
